organizations: Hampshire-Henpeck Unit of Home and Community Education
title: Hampshire-Henpeck HCE to meet Oct. 20
text: Hampshire-Henpeck HCE The Hampshire-Henpeck Unit of Home and Community Education will meet at 12:30 p.m. Tuesday, Oct. 20, at Heartland Bank, Route 72 and Warner, Hampshire. At the October meeting, guest speaker Anne Versluys, a physical therapist from KishHealth System, will offer suggestions and exercises to keep you flexible and more mobile. Remember to bring your supplies for the Christmas project. Hostesses for this month are Barbara Mursu and Claudia Lake. Hope you all had a chance to visit the Hampshire-Henpeck HCE display at the Heartland Bank for HCE Week and attend the open house at the extension office. Registration and fees of $20 for the County International/New Member Luncheon on Wednesday, Nov. 11, will be due. The country of study is Lithuania. Enjoy a delicious Lithuanian lunch with exciting entertainment. Hampshire-Henpeck HCE is a unit of the Kane County Association for Home and Community Education. If you would like more information on the organization, contact Geraldine Rizik, (847) 683-2784 or Barbara Janicak, (847) 946-4696. Share this page
